prompt: Generate diverse and realistic customer feedback text that expresses negative sentiment. The feedback should convey dissatisfaction, frustration, or disappointment with a product, service, or experience. Include a wide range of contexts such as online shopping, restaurant visits, customer support interactions, app usage, travel experiences, or subscription services. Use varied tones (e.g., angry, sarcastic, disappointed, formal, passive-aggressive) and lengths (from short complaints to detailed critical reviews). Incorporate different perspectives, such as feedback from younger or older customers, or from different cultural backgrounds. Include subtle or nuanced negativity (e.g., mild frustration or polite criticism) alongside strong complaints. Examples could include criticism of poor quality, delays, unhelpful staff, technical issues, misleading advertising, or unpleasant experiences.
response:
I ordered a dress that looked stunning online, but it arrived wrinkled and completely different in color. 

The customer service representative seemed more interested in ending the call than helping me resolve my issue with the product.

I’ve been waiting for my refund for two weeks now. This is ridiculous, and I’m not sure I’ll shop here again.

The food was cold, and the waiter forgot my drink order. I expected better from this restaurant.

I downloaded the app with high hopes, but it crashes every time I try to open it. What a waste of time!

I can’t believe I paid so much for a hotel that turned out to be noisy and dirty. Very disappointing.

The delivery was late, and when it finally arrived, the package was damaged. I’m not happy at all.

I signed up for a monthly subscription, but the content is so repetitive. I feel cheated.

My experience at the salon was awful. The stylist didn’t listen to my requests and left my hair a mess.

I tried to return a pair of shoes, but the staff was rude and unhelpful. I won’t be coming back.

The online product description was misleading, and now I have something I can’t use. Very frustrating.

I expected a relaxing vacation, but the hotel was understaffed, and the service was terrible.

I reached out for support, but the agent was dismissive and didn’t solve my problem at all.

The movie was marketed as a thriller, but it was just boring. I want my money back!

I ordered a pizza that was supposed to have extra toppings, but it arrived with barely any. Very disappointing.

The tour guide was late and seemed unprepared. It ruined our sightseeing experience.

I was promised next-day delivery, but my package still hasn’t arrived a week later. What’s going on?

I thought this product would be high quality, but it broke after just one use. I’m really upset.

The staff at the store were more focused on their phones than helping customers. Not impressed.

The app has a lot of bugs, and it’s frustrating to navigate. I expected better from this company.

I waited too long for my food, and when it arrived, it was cold. I won’t be back anytime soon.

I was excited to try this restaurant, but the portions were tiny and overpriced. Total letdown.

I had a terrible experience with customer service. They didn’t take my complaint seriously.

I bought a gadget that was advertised to be easy to use, but it’s been nothing but trouble.

The flight was delayed without any explanation, and the staff had no answers. Very unprofessional.

I found the product to be of low quality, and it didn’t match the description at all. Disappointing.

I was treated poorly by the staff, and it made my dining experience uncomfortable.

The website is confusing, and I had a hard time finding what I needed. Very frustrating.

I received the wrong order, and the restaurant didn’t take responsibility. Not happy.

The subscription promised exclusive content, but it’s all stuff I can find for free online.

I had to wait on hold for an hour to get support, only to be transferred multiple times.

The packaging was damaged upon arrival, and I’m worried about the product inside.

The service at this hotel was lacking, and I felt ignored as a guest.

I bought a pair of headphones that stopped working within a week. What a waste of money!

I was excited about this event, but the venue was overcrowded and poorly organized.

The product didn’t work as advertised, and I’m stuck with it now. Very frustrating.

I found the staff to be unhelpful when I tried to ask for recommendations.

The app is so slow that I’ve given up on using it altogether. Huge disappointment.

My travel experience was marred by poor communication from the airline. Not what I expected.

I had high hopes for this online course, but the content was outdated and not useful.

The clothing I ordered was ill-fitting and of poor quality. I won’t be buying again.

The service I received was subpar, and I felt like I was bothering the staff.

I was misled by the promotional offers, and it felt like a bait-and-switch situation.

The food was bland, and I left feeling unsatisfied. I won’t recommend this place.

I reached out for help, but the response was vague and didn’t address my concerns.

I was really disappointed with the lack of variety in the menu. It was underwhelming.
